title: Sample, 1989
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: Silk plisse that was shrunk and clamp discharged in her studio.  The silk  was woven to cause puckering when shrunk which produced ridges in the fabric.
description: Black with areas of brown and redish brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample, 1989.
1989. Medium: silk
Technique: Silk plisse that was shrunk and clamp discharged in her studio.  The silk  was woven to cause puckering when shrunk which produced ridges in the fabric.. Gift of Marian Clayden. 1991-87-2.
